page.title: 05Family Life: Rosneath
page.content: Majority of families made up of 4 people most of which are Mum, Dad and 2 children. Many of these families live in MOD houses. Most houses use electricity as their main fuel and this is mostly used for cooking, light ing and heating. Of houses that have pets, dogs found the most popular. Other pets include cats, rabbits, hamsters, mice, fish (goldfish and many tropical) and birds like budgies, canaries and parrots. In spare time children mostly play outdoor games, watch television, play computer games and Scrabble with parents. People used to buy food daily at the local foodstore but now that new Fine Fare opened in Helens- burgh many people buy their food weekly or monthly. Some people even buy milk weekly and freeze it!
